short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The world's leading emoji keyboard for Chrome. Now Unicode 15.1 compatible!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Love our emoji?  Visit https://www.joypixels.com to download them free!

Spread the Joy™ with the Emoji Keyboard by JoyPixels™. 

We think you'll love our: 

- Beautiful Emoji
- Fast and Extensive Search Results
- Handy Features

Let us know what you think!

Change Log:
-----------------------------------------------------------

9.0.1 Release December 8, 2024

- default to focus on search, option in settings to focus on emoji
- some minor bug fixes

-----------------------------------------------------------

9.0.0 Release November 15, 2024

- update emoji assets to JoyPixels version 9.0, with Unicode 15.1 compatibility
- upgraded build framework with improvements to speed and memory usage
- improved search results
- improvements to general usability including new search shortcuts (press S to search, CMD+F to search, tab to exit search and begin arrow nav)

-----------------------------------------------------------

8.0.0 Update Release August 22, 2023

- updated emoji assets to JoyPixels version 8.0, with Unicode 15.0 compatibility
- new emoji include shaking face, new shades of hearts, moose, jellyfish, flute, and more
- hint: interested in the evolution of emoji? use the search term "uc15" to see all unicode 15.0, "uc14" for 14.0 and so on!

-----------------------------------------------------------

7.0.0 Update Release August 09, 2022

- updated emoji assets to JoyPixels version 7.0, with Unicode 14.0 compatibility

-----------------------------------------------------------

6.6.0 Update Release July 08, 2021

- updated emoji assets to JoyPixels version 6.6

-----------------------------------------------------------

6.5.1 Update Release April 26, 2021

- maintenance update
- minor bug fixes and improvements

-----------------------------------------------------------

6.5.0 Update Release February 19, 2021

- updated to JoyPixels 6.5, with Unicode 13.1 compatibility

-----------------------------------------------------------

6.0.2 Update Release November 4, 2020

- scroll overflow adjustment

-----------------------------------------------------------

6.0.1 Update Release July 1, 2020

- category scroll adjustment
- prevent scroll to middle when emoji clicked

-----------------------------------------------------------

6.0.0 Update Release June 23, 2020

- updated icons to JoyPixels 6.0
- now Unicode 13 compatible 

-----------------------------------------------------------

5.5.2 Update Release May 26, 2020

- notification banner bugfix

-----------------------------------------------------------

5.5.1 Update Release May 6, 2020

- removed leading/trailing space around emoji on auto insert
- added setting to turn off auto insert

-----------------------------------------------------------

5.5.0 Update Release February 10, 2020

- updated to JoyPixels 5.5, including Unicode 12.1 compatibility
- emoji arrow nav bugfix

-----------------------------------------------------------

5.0.4 Update Release January 13, 2020

- removal of unused permissions
- addition of copy/paste permissions for improved overall performance

-----------------------------------------------------------

5.0.3 Update Release September 16, 2019

- prevent auto insert on Gmail (causing formatting errors)
- code point updates

-----------------------------------------------------------

5.0.2 Update Release August 28, 2019

- improvements to scroll functionality
- auto input improvements for Facebook, Twitter, and standard text fields
- emoji search improvements


About:

- Auto-Input emoji by simply clicking the emoji from the panel (works with most web-sites).
- Auto-Copy to clipboard feature for all other sites.
- Navigate the emoji panel mouse free, by using arrows and page up/down.
- Search returns smart results from our expanding keyboard database. 
- Saves your most recently used emoji at the top, for easier access.
- Diversity selector makes it easy to browse and insert skin tone emoji.

Settings:
- Turn On/Off Auto-Copy (copies/pastes emoji string to clipboard).
- Adjust number of recent emoji to display in panel.
- Emoji Icon Size (adjust size of icons in the extension panel).
- Panel state docked/undocked (undocking allows for persistent window).
- Launch Shortcut (set your keyboard shortcut to launch panel).

Other:
- 100% Unicode compliant.
- Start using new emojis on the first day they become available to the public.
- Artwork is updated yearly.

Known Issues:

- Tweetdeck auto insert is currently disabled as of 9/28/16. Recent changes to Tweetdeck sites pose challenges in performing accurate auto insert and using auto insert as it was caused breaking changes to certain functions within the Tweetdeck interface.

Development Road Map:

- Option to display native system emoji in keyboard panel, instead of JoyPixels.

Help report any issues you run into at https://www.joypixels.com/contact. 

Your love, feedback, ratings and reviews keep this software going and help us to Spread the Joy™.
